name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, master ]
  pull_request:

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Use Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 18
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
      - name: Build (client + server)
        run: npm run build
      - name: Run tests
        run: npm test

  docker-build:
    if: github.event_name == 'push' && contains(github.ref, 'refs/heads/')
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build-and-test
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Build Docker image
        run: |
          docker build -t ${{ github.repository }}:${{ github.sha }} .
      - name: Login to Docker Hub (optional)
        if: secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME && secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN
        uses: docker/login-action@v2
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN }}
      - name: Push to Docker Hub (optional)
        if: secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME && secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN
        run: |
          docker tag ${{ github.repository }}:${{ github.sha }} ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}/${{ github.repository }}:latest
          docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}/${{ github.repository }}:latest
